name: Juruna
description: The indigenous inhabit Brazil for more than 10.000 years. In 1500 initiated the land colonization by the use of the force of the portuguese. Only in 1982, the first indigenous, Mario Juruna, was elected as federal deputy. For me, this colorful is what democracy should have been in my country. But, despite of the plurallity, the same men occupy the places where the people should be. Drawing over a Juruna's picture taken in Brazilian Parliament.
